title: Test issue:  xxhash
body:
>

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```
$ spack install --test=all xxhash

```

### Information on your system
```
~/key4hep-spack/environments/key4hep-release (release *)$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2301-b2fd7cb23b
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell
* **Concretizer:** clingo
 ```


### Additional information

```
 17 ==> [2021-06-07-07:41:20.588511] 'make' '-j4' 'test'
 18 /home/ubuntu/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -O3 -Wall -Wextra -Wconversion -Wcast-qual -Wcast-align -Wshadow -Wstrict-aliasing=1 -Wswitch-enum -Wdeclaration-after-statement -Wstric
    t-prototypes -Wundef -Wpointer-arith -Wformat-security -Wvla -Wformat=2 -Winit-self -Wfloat-equal -Wwrite-strings -Wredundant-decls -Wstrict-overflow=2 -DXXH_DEBUGLEVEL=1  -DXXH
    _INLINE_ALL xxhsum.c -o xxhsum_inlinedXXH
 19 /home/ubuntu/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -c xxhash.c
 20 # stdin
 21 # xxhsum to/from pipe
 22 ./xxhsum < xxhash.c
 23 ./xxhsum xxh* | ./xxhsum -c -
 24 a9c413a5c9548a52  stdin
 25 # multiple files
 26 ./xxhsum xxhash.* xxhsum.*
 27 
 28 
 29 
 30 
 31 a9c413a5c9548a52  xxhash.c
 32 16202f617e5c033f  xxhash.h
 33 7d69ca0fc468d260  xxhash.o
 34 97ba9f570a9afbf3  xxhsum.1
 35 d5c4e7e087228340  xxhsum.1.md
 36 1414de29af260867  xxhsum.c
 37 b6d452b27ab9e71d  xxhsum.o
 38 xxh128sum: OK
 39 xxh3.h: OK
 40 xxh32sum: OK
 41 xxh64sum: OK
 42 xxh_x86dispatch.c: OK
 43 xxh_x86dispatch.h: OK
 44 xxhash.c: OK
 45 xxhash.h: OK
 46 xxhash.o: OK
 47 xxhsum: OK
 48 xxhsum.1: OK
 49 xxhsum.1.md: OK
 50 xxhsum.c: OK
 51 xxhsum.o: OK
 52 # internal bench
 53 ./xxhsum -H0 xxh* | ./xxhsum -c -
 54 ./xxhsum -bi0
 55 ./xxhsum 0.7.4 by Yann Collet, compiled as 64-bit x86_64 + SSE2 little endian with GCC 9.3.0
 56 Sample of 100 KB...
 57 
 58 
 59  1-XXH32                         :     102400 ->
 66 xxh_x86dispatch.c: OK
 67 xxh_x86dispatch.h: OK
 68 xxhash.c: OK
 69 xxhash.h: OK
 70 xxhash.o: OK
 71 xxhsum: OK
 72 xxhsum.1: OK
 73 xxhsum.1.md: OK
 74 xxhsum.c: OK
 75 xxhsum.o: OK
 76 # xxhsum -q does not display "Loading" message into stderr (#251)
 77 ! ./xxhsum -q xxh* 2>&1 | grep Loading
 78 # xxhsum does not display "Loading" message into stderr either
 79 ! ./xxhsum xxh* 2>&1 | grep Loading
 80 # Check that xxhsum do display filename that it failed to open.
 81 LC_ALL=C ./xxhsum nonexistent 2>&1 | grep "Error: Could not open 'nonexistent'"
 82 Error: Could not open 'nonexistent': No such file or directory.
 83 # xxhsum to/from file, shell redirection
 84 ./xxhsum xxh* > .test.xxh64
 85 
 86 
 87 ./xxhsum -H0 xxh* > .test.xxh32
 88 
 89 
 90 ./xxhsum -H2 xxh* > .test.xxh128
 91 
 92 
 93 ./xxhsum -c .test.xxh64
 94 xxh128sum: OK
 95 xxh3.h: OK
 96 xxh32sum: OK
 97 xxh64sum: OK
 98 xxh_x86dispatch.c: OK
 99 xxh_x86dispatch.h: OK
100 xxhash.c: OK
101 xxhash.h: OK
102 xxhash.o: OK
103 xxhsum: OK
104 xxhsum.1: OK
105 xxhsum.1.md: OK
106 xxhsum.c: OK
```

### General information


- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
